question:
You recently received an invitation for three day training program which should benefit you and the company. Write a letter to your manager and say.

Ask To attend this program
Describe the program
Explain how the will benefit the company
text: I am writing, seek your approval for joining and intensive training programme in personality development and relationship building.

I am recently promoted as functional assistant manager in Human Resource Department, I personally feel lacking behind in many traits such as relationship management and teamwork. Since these traits are Must for my profile, would be grateful if you allow me to attend a training session, I recently got invited for. It is a three day program, commencing  on 5th June at Hotel Hamilton, organised by Young Aspirants Teaching Consultancy. The program will start with an orientation session, constituting indepth description of traits required to enhance professionalism. Next two days are fixed for practical teaching related exercises specially designed to promote teamwork and relationship management.

Program will not only be beneficial for me at personal level but will also help me to benefit company; as after developing these skills I will be able to make better connections with companies clients and will effectively deal with interpersonal issues in company.
I hope you will think upon my request and respond in positive way.
